name: SINNER (itch) (Ryabcev Pavel)
description:
You are a serial killer who has robbed many people of their precious lives. The time has come and death has overtaken you. And now death itself gives you a chance to atone for your sins and purify your soul. But to do this, you should go through purgatory and not let the darkness consume your soul and thereby go straight to hell. The choice will be yours, pure soul and eternal peace or eternal suffering in the madness of hell.

What will you choose?

Attention!

-A demo version of the game is provided!
